GlobalSettings.description: This object is used to represent global settings of alert recipient.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RetryCount.description: Retry count of additional times that the OOB alert service will attempt to send an OOB alert.
RetryCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be retry count of additional times that the OOB alert service will attempt to send an OOB alert.

RetryInterval.description: The time interval that the OOB alert service will wait between retries to send an OOB alert.
RetryInterval.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the time interval that the OOB alert service will wait between retries to send an OOB alert.

RntryRetryInterval.description: The time interval that the OOB alert service will wait before sending an alert to the next OOB alert recipient in the list.
RntryRetryInterval.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the time interval that the OOB alert service will wait before sending an alert to the next OOB alert recipient in the list.

LenovoManagerProperties.description: This object is used to represent Lenovo extended Manager properties.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Configuration.description: A reference to the configuration service properties.
Configuration.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the configuration service characteristics of this manager and shall be of type LenovoConfigurationService.

DateTimeService.description: This property is a reference to Date and Time setting
DateTimeService.longDescription: By the property, user can check how the manager update its Date and time.

FoD.description: A reference to the Feature on Demand service properties.
FoD.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the Feature on Demand service characteristics of this manager and shall be of type LenovoFoDService.

KCSEnabled.description: The value of this property enable or disable IPMI on KCS channel.
KCSEnabled.longDescription: Redfish support to expose the level of service to align with product generation and release cycles.

OPSetting.description: This property is a reference to the configuration of OpenID Provider.
OPSetting.longDescription: This is a reference to the configuration of OpenID Provider.

Recipients.description: A reference to the event recepient properties.
Recipients.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the event recipient characteristics of this manager and shall be of type LenovoAlertRecipient.

RecipientsSettings.longDescription: The value of this property shall be object to represent the event recipient characteristics of this manager.

RemoteControl.description: A reference to the remote control properties.
RemoteControl.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the remote control characteristics of this manager and shall be of type LenovoRemoteControlService.

RemoteMap.description: A reference to the remote map properties, corresponding to CLI rdmount
RemoteMap.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the remote map characteristics of this manager and shall be of type LenovoRemoteMapService.

SecureKeyLifecycleService.description: This property is a reference to secure key lifecycle service.
SecureKeyLifecycleService.longDescription: This is a reference to secure key lifecycle service.

Security.description: A reference to the security service properties.
Security.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the security service characteristics of this manager and shall be of type LenovoSecurityService.

ServerProfile.description: A reference to the server profile service properties.
ServerProfile.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the server profile service characteristics of this manager and shall be of type LenovoServerProfileService.

ServiceAdvisor.description: This property is a reference to service advisor
ServiceAdvisor.longDescription: This is a reference to service advisor of the manager.

ServiceData.description: A reference to capture the service data properties.
ServiceData.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that can be used to collect service data, FFDC and latest OS failure screen.

Watchdogs.description: This property is a reference to watchdogs setting
Watchdogs.longDescription: This is a reference to watchdog settings of the manager.

release_name.description: This property indicates redfish release name for product generation and release cycles.
release_name.longDescription: This property determines whether or not IPMI access Control to the BMC should be allowed on the KCS channel.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AuthorizationServerUri.description: This property indicates the URI of LXCA authorization server endpoint.
AuthorizationServerUri.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the URI of LXCA authorization server endpoint.

ClientID.description: This property indicates the client identifier which normally is XCC UUID.
ClientID.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the the client identifier which normally is XCC UUID.

PubKey.description: This property indicates pub key for single sign on.
PubKey.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate pub key for single sign on.

SSOState.description: This property indicates if XCC is managed by LXCA.
SSOState.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate if XCC is managed by LXCA.

UserInfoUri.description: This property indicates the URI of UserInfo endpoint.
UserInfoUri.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the URI of UserInfo endpoint.

title: #LenovoManager.v1_0_0
